short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redacting the Internet, one page at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension that redacts all the information on the Internet, just like your favorite oppressive regime.
By simply adjusting a few CSS properties, all the distracting text and images on your favorite website are removed.

To temporarily restore the normal appearance of a page, click the 'disable' button in the Redacto toolbar.
To restore all pages, simply disable the extension in Chrome's extension manager.
